infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Mood Leaf uses your microphone for voice journaling. All voice processing happens on your device.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsFullAccessUsageDescription: Mood Leaf can read your calendar to offer check-ins before and after social events. We never modify your calendar.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Mood Leaf can read your sleep and activity data to help you notice patterns. This data never leaves your device.
